author: Ben Kew, Ben Kew
title: Wuhan Doctors: Up to 10% of 'Recovered' Chinese Coronavirus Patients Testing Positive
description: Up to ten percent of patients who were told they had recovered from the Chinese coronavirus tested positive again after being discharged from hospital, doctors in Wuhan, the origin city of the pandemic, revealed this week.
content:
Up to ten percent of patients who were told they had recovered from the Chinese coronavirus tested positive again after being discharged from hospital, doctors in Wuhan, the origin city of the pandemic, revealed this week.
